subject: Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: The Patriot’s pattern of videotaping the signals of opposing N.F.L. coaches prompted a letter addressed to all teams from the N.F.L. vice president detailing the league’s interpretation of the rules.
snippet: The Patriot’s pattern of videotaping the signals of opposing N.F.L. coaches prompted a letter addressed to all teams from the N.F.L. vice president detailing the league’s interpretation of the rules.
